mapper.select:
select
from yijianxiang where xueShengID = #{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and tiJiaoZhuangTai = #{1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by tiJiaoShiJian desc
select count(*) from yijianxiang where xueShengID = #{0,jdbcType=INTEGER} and tiJiaoZhuangTai = #{1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by tiJiaoShiJian desc
